name: Tech Nottingham March 2022 - What���s it Worth?

description.html:
[Full event details on our website](https://www.technottingham.com/events/tech-nottingham-march-2022)

**Our previously announced speaker is unable to attend, so this month our founder Andrew Seward will present his talk at Tech Nottingham.**
Plus we'll be having fun and giving away swag and prizes.
This event will be online on Zoom. The joining link will be published on the day of the event.
New to Online Tech Nottingham? Read about [what to expect](https://andrew-seward-cz7k.squarespace.com/news/2020/5/6/attending-an-online-tech-nottingham-event).

***

# What���s it Worth? - Understanding the value of what you build

*by Andrew Seward*
The features, changes and improvements we identify and make to the software we look after can often seem very clear to us in the value they will deliver to the business and to customers, but even the most simple changes can in practice be eye-wateringly expensive investments.
And so the question ���How much money will this make or save us?��� is a reasonable one, especially if you���re the one paying for it. This however is a very difficult question to answer.
In this talk Andrew will talk through a lightweight approach to assess the financial value of a development by breaking it down into simple questions and assumptions. He���ll share an example and provide a template for you to use in your own organisation.
Andrew Seward

## About Andrew

Andrew is the founder of Tech Nottingham and Hack24, he���s spoken at over a hundred events, he���s also Head of Data Product Development at Experian and has been working in tech for 17 years in development, product management and senior leadership positions.

**Win Stuff at Tech Nottingham**

We���ll be giving away some awesome prizes to our lucky attendees. Details on how to win will be shared during the event.

**Join in with the Nottingham Tech Community online**

The Tech Nottingham Slack group is a bustling chat community of Nottingham tech folk sharing ideas, jokes, stories and helping one another. We'd love for you to join in and be a part of it!

Join our Slack group: http://www.technottingham.com/slack

**Thanks to our sponsors**

Capital One, Cronofy and MHR

[Full event details on our website](https://www.technottingham.com/events/tech-nottingham-march-2022)
